pageContext.claim: “I think our Secretary of State, despite the fact that the New York Times said he was missing -- he was in North Korea -- but I think our Secretary of State has done a fantastic job. Mike, did you know that you were missing? They couldn't find you. They couldn't find him. They couldn't find him because he was in North Korea.”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times did not say that Secretary of State Mike Pompeo was missing; the headline on the article was: "At a Key Moment, Trump’s Top Diplomat Is Again Thousands of Miles Away." The article was about the angst of European diplomats who could not reach Pompeo as Trump prepared to withdraw from the Iran nuclear agreement because Pompeo was in North Korea. The diplomats did not understand why Pompeo did not delay his trip at such a diplomatically important moment.
